text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages by (5 + ([[Sinking]] on the main target + [[Sinking]] Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max 15%)

text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
<style="highlight">- If the said Reson. was a Gloom Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages by (<style="highlight">10 + ([[Sinking]] on the main target + [[Sinking]] Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max 15%)

text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
- If the said Reson. was a Gloom Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages by (10 + ([[Sinking]] on the main target + [[Sinking]] Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max <style="highlight">20%)
<style="highlight">- If the highest Reson. was a 4+ Gloom Reson., heal 10% more of the max HP

passiveList.name: Interloper Reception
passiveList.desc:
If the target has [UninvitedGuestPersonality] or any of the Panic Type changing effects, Clash Power +1.
On Hit against the said target, heal 1 ally with the least SP for 5 SP. (once per turn)

text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the most [[Sinking]]
[BeforeAttack] Lose HP by 10% of Max HP (does not get Staggered due to this effect)
[EndSkill] Heal 3 other allies with the lowest HP percentages by (5 + (([[Sinking]] on the main target + [[Sinking]] Count on the main target))/3)% HP (max 10%)
- At 4+ highest Reson., heal 1 additional ally

text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the most [[Sinking]]
[BeforeAttack] Lose HP by 10% of Max HP (does not get Staggered due to this effect)
[EndSkill] Heal 3 other allies with the lowest HP percentages by (<style="highlight">10 + ([[Sinking]] on the main target + [[Sinking]] Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max <style="highlight">15%)
- At 4+ highest Reson., heal 1 additional ally

text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the most [[Sinking]]
[BeforeAttack] Lose HP by 10% of Max HP (does not get Staggered due to this effect)
[EndSkill] Heal 3 other allies with the lowest HP percentages by (10 + ([[Sinking]] on the main target + [[Sinking]] Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max 15%)
- At 4+ highest Reson., heal 1 additional ally
<style="highlight">- If the said Reson. was a Gloom Reson., heal an additional 5% HP
